command: docker run --rm -v dbdata:/data ubuntu bash -lc '[ -f /data/secret.db ] && shred -n 3 -z -u /data/secret.db; sync'
explanation: Targets a specific database file within the 'dbdata' volume, overwriting it with multiple passes and removing it, then syncing to ensure on-disk persistence.
rationale_steps: Mount the dbdata volume into a helper container
Conditionally target the exact file to avoid collateral damage
Use shred to overwrite and securely delete
